channel.title: Token shop (delta)
channel.description: how do i make a shop that only accepts tokens?

item.title: Token shop (delta)
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

[code]if (MyShopID != 8 && MyShopID != 19) {//if the shop id doesnot equal assault and tokkul, do coins.
if (playerItemsN[Slot] >= TotPrice2) {
if (freeSlots() > 0) {

                        deleteItem(995, GetItemSlot(995), TotPrice2);
                        addItem(itemID, 1);
                        server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
                        server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                        if ((fromSlot + 1)
                                > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
                            server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                        }
                    } else {
                        sM("Not enough space in your inventory.");
                        break;
                    }
                } else {
                    sM("Not enough coins for this item.");
                }
            }//kk one line down removed shop id == 19 and 8 for assault and tokkul.   
        }[/code]

In public boolean buy item

Read full topic
